record.name: General Checkout
record.options: <sections><section labelId="23"><text field="title" fieldType="character" labelId="5" mandatory="true" modifiability="create"/><text field="description" fieldType="character" labelId="7" mandatory="false" modifiability="update" multiline="true"/></section><section labelId="8"><text field="contact.name" fieldType="character" labelId="19" lookUpField="contact.name" lookUpTable="contacts" mandatory="true" modifiability="update"/><text field="callback.contact" fieldType="character" labelId="18" lookUpField="contact.name" lookUpTable="contacts" mandatory="true" modifiability="update"/><select defaultValue="E-mail" field="callback.type" fieldType="character" globalList="Callback Type" labelId="12" mandatory="true" modifiability="update" style="combo"/></section><section labelId="20"><select field="affected.item" fieldType="character" labelId="22" mandatory="false" modifiability="update" style="combo"/><select field="severity" fieldType="character" globalList="Urgency" labelId="21" mandatory="true" modifiability="update" style="combo"/></section></sections>
